metadata.title: CVE-2024-8386 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: If a site had been granted the permission to open popup windows, it couldcause Select elements to appear on top of another site to perform aspoofing attack. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 130 and Firefox ESR <128.2.

criterions.comment: mozjs102: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs115: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
